Description:
The crowd cheers your victory! Not only have you defeated Astarios, but you have also defeated Astorhus, the former champion, at the same time! This fight will be remembered and talked about everywhere for a long time.

As the new champions of the arena, you've won a commemorative trophy and a good amount of gold. After enjoying the crowd's favor and chants for a while, you decide to move to the rest area.

While you are resting and preparing to split your loot, the arena owner enters the room and speaks to you.

    "SSRewardText": "She gives you an ancient badge with the shape of a wooden sword and tells you that, under normal circumstances, she would offer you a place as the resident champions in the arena. \r\n\nHowever, she wonders if you might help her find the legendary gladiatorial plaza instead. Many champions have searched for it in the past, even her former gladiator friends, but none have ever found it.\n\nShe believes that you may be the one chosen to find the legendary gladiatorial plaza.\n\nYou agree to carry on the gladiators' legacy and search for that place.",
